import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "tailwindcss/tailwind.css"; import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const CompanyDetail = () => { const [companies, setCompanies] = useState([]); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [companyId, setCompanyId] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:3000/company") .then((response) => { setCompanies(response.data); }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error); }); }, []); return ( {companies.map((company) => ( (company.email !== "tadreex@gmail.com") && ))}
